Oak_Lawn.Washington Heights (Metra station):
Washington Heights Station is a commuter railroad station on Metra's Rock Island District line in the Washington Heights neighborhood of Chicago, Illinois, 12 miles (19 km) from LaSalle Street, the northern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Washington Heights is in zone C.
Sometimes referred to as 103rd Street - Washington Heights Station, the station is used only during rush hour. Regular service can be found at 103rd Street - Beverly Hills Station.
